conclusion: I'll analyze how shadows A, B, C, and D will change when the light source moves forward (toward the objects) while remaining above them.
Object A: A decorative kimono/dress figurine with floral pattern
Object B: A small white stand/pedestal with what appears to be a postcard
Object C: Another part of the kimono figure
Object D: A small bottle or container
The red arrows point to the shadows cast by these objects on the tiled floor.
When a light source moves closer to objects while remaining above them: Shadows will move inward (toward the base of their respective objects) and shadows will become smaller.

premise: Shadow A extends outward from the base of the figurine
conclusion: Shadow A will move inward toward the base of the figurine

premise: Shadow A extends outward from the base of the figurine
conclusion: Shadow A will become smaller and less elongated

premise: Shadow B extends outward from the base of the stand
conclusion: Shadow B will move inward toward the base of the stand

premise: Shadow B extends outward from the base of the stand
conclusion: Shadow B will become smaller and less elongated

premise: Shadow C extends outward from the base of the figurine
conclusion: Shadow C will move inward toward the base of the figurine

premise: Shadow C extends outward from the base of the figurine
conclusion: Shadow C will become smaller and less elongated

premise: Shadow D extends outward from the base of the bottle
conclusion: Shadow D will move inward toward the base of the bottle

premise: Shadow D extends outward from the base of the bottle
conclusion: Shadow D will become smaller and less elongated
When the light source is directly above objects, shadows are minimal. As the light source moves to an angle, shadows elongate away from the light.

When the light source moves forward (closer to the objects while remaining above), the angle of incoming light becomes steeper (more vertical), causing the shadows to move closer to directly beneath their objects and the shadows to become smaller and less stretched out.
